g.text: app writes will fail, app must retry

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: Configure alias_name to read/write from new_index

Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: Clients MUST retry failed creates/updates for up to ~ 1 minute.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: - Writes will be temporarily disabled for a few seconds during the procedure to prevent data loss.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: Clients MUST read and write to an alias. Clients must NOT write directly to an index.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: - To prevent downtime, the migration procedure only operates on aliased indexes.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: Hard-deletes during reindexing will NOT affect the migrated index.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: - Implement soft-deletes (e.g. set a deleted_at) with a recurring hard-delete job. Run the hard-delete job after reindexing.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: During reindexing, searches will return duplicate results for updated documents.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: - After reindexing, only the latest update will appear in search results.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: - Hide duplicate documents in searches by implementing `collapse` on ID field and sort by `_index`

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: I have an alias `products` pointing at index `products-20250301000000`.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: I have heavy reads and writes with 10M+ documents in the index

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: I want to reindex `products-20250301000000` into a new index and update the

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: `products` alias to reference it, without losing any creates/updates/deletes

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: Attempt to migrate in-place as a non-breaking

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: If that succeeds, migration is done.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: Test reindexing 1 record into a temp index.

text.font-family: Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji
Comic Shanns, monospace, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: If the test reindexing fails, abort.
